summary.p: 10 fol. on parchment; Shelfmark: Marcel 56; Qurʾānic Text: Q 3:162-3:178; 6 lines per page; Dimensions: 257 x 192mm; Script style: kūfī D.I.

This entry was created on the basis of the information made available by Valery V. Polosin (1939-2014), without use of manuscript images. Therefore, the exact distribution of the Qurʾānic passages across the manuscript pages is unknown to us, and all the passages are shown as belonging to fol. 1. The catalogue entry by Polosin contains the following information:
10 fol. 192×257 mm (1.333). Support: thin transparent parchment of yellowish color, with traces of polishing. Writing material: brown ink.
Collation: one quire; fol. 1 and 10, 3 and 8, 5 and 6 are bifolia, fol. 2, 4, 7, 9 are singletons with stubs.
I: H1F H2F S H3F H4F S H5F / F6H F7H S F8H F9H S F10H
Text layout: 93×175 мм (1.88), 6 lines. Ruling: absent. Script: D I. Diacritics: rare diagonal dashes in brown and red ink. Vocalization: round red dots.

Verse markers: for individual verses – golden rosettes (type 3.1.2); for groups of five verses – medallions (type 3.B.I) in the text line, in gold and colors, with the inscribed word خمس (fol. 3r, 9r); for groups of ten verses – round medallions (type 3.B.II) in the text line, in gold and colors with the inscribed verse number (مائة ثمنون – fol. 6r).
Stitching: threads are preserved in the punctures of the fold; on the outer folds of the outer bifolium; there are traces of brown substance (leather of the spine?).
Defects: minor stains and traces of moisture; parchment slightly damaged by aggressive ink on fol. 1–3, 5; ink peeling off on the flesh side of some sheets.

Attached materials: old wrapping (fol. I) consisting of a narrow strip of paper inscribed with the old accession number in red pencil “B. 34” and on the verso side with the address “Q. des Grands Augustins 27”; a sheet of paper (fol. II) with the pencil note by V. A. Krachkovskaya: “Фрагмент В. 34, 10 f. \ Формат и число строк \ не соответствуют описанию V. Langlois: \ не 5 строк, а 6; размер около 20×26, \ а не 19×26. \ (Ср. Дело № 21, 1864, 8 серия B. 34) \ В. Крачковская”.
Old accession numbers: B. 34 (according to Langlois’ inventory).
Fol. 1r–10v. Surah 3, verses 156(162)–172(178). Incipit: [جهنم] وبئس المصير . Explicit: كفروا انما [نملي لهم]."
Olga Yastrebova has translated and sometimes corrected the notes of V. Polosin. Corrected passages are marked with ОЯ (O.Ya).
